title: Pallone Applauds FERC’s Decision to Consider Climate, Environmental Justice in Natural Gas Certification Process
summary: Chairman Pallone applauds FERC's orders to incorporate climate change, landowner protections, and environmental justice considerations in the natural gas certification process.
